text: Baía de Todos os Santos (All Saints's Bay) is a bay in the Brazilian state of Bahia. It is the biggest bay of Brazil. It is long and wide."Todos os Santos Bay." Encyclopædia Britannica Online. 6 November 2010. The bay was first seen on November 1, 1501, by the expedition of Amerigo Vespucci. It received its name because November 1 is All Saints' Day. The bay is visited by tourists from all over the world.All Saints' Bay. bahia.com.br. ==References== Category:Tourism Category:Geography of Brazil Category:Bodies of water of South America Category:Bays
title: Baía de Todos os Santos
